doc.title: Family Affair
doc.plot: Like a scene torn from THE COLOR PURPLE or CAPTURING THE FRIEDMANS, this deeply personal and uncompromising documentary examines the complex levels of pedophilia and how it can manipulate and control an entire family for life. FAMILY AFFAIR is also a story about resilience, survival and understanding a child's capacity to accommodate a parent's past crimes in order to satisfy a basic longing for family.
